name: planning-center
title: Planning Center
description: Quickly look up people in Planning Center and copy their contact info
author: caleb531

commands.name: lookup-people
commands.title: Look up Planning Center People
commands.description: Allows you to look up people in your Planning Center organization and copy their contact info

preferences.name: app_id
preferences.title: Client ID
preferences.description: The client ID provided by Planning Center once you've generated a Personal Access Token
preferences.placeholder: Enter the client ID generated by Planning Center

preferences.name: app_secret
preferences.title: Secret
preferences.description: The app secret provided by Planning Center once you've generated a Personal Access Token
preferences.placeholder: Enter the secret generated by Planning Center

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
